Replying to @djm_ 2019-05-17 11:55
@djm_ I’m finding that for long periods they are more comfortable than any in or on-ear headphones I’ve had. I regularly comfortably wear them on 11 hour flights while hardly ever taking them off. Even while sleeping. The ambient cabin noise seems deafening when you take them off.
